data.title: Metropolitan Areas – Rankings – POLICOM
data.text:
Economic Strength Rankings - Metropolitan Areas

Metropolitan Statistical Areas (MSA) have at least one city with a population of 50,000 or more, plus adjacent territory that has a high degree of social and economic integration with the core as measured by the location of the commuting workforce.

They must have at minimum one county and most of the time include several counties.

There are 384 Metropolitan Statistical Areas (OMB Bulletin 20-01).

Please see the PDF version of the rankings which includes a discussion of the results and the methodology. CLICK HERE.
